Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Forest Preserve
ShortDescription: #78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Montrose, Narragansett, Irving Park, Harlem Over regular route.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Montrose, Narragansett, Irving Park, Harlem Over regular route, due to street blockage near Montrose/Forest Preserve.

Allow extra travel time.
